name: Raydar
description: Captain, the enemy fleet has spotted our outpost! Our only hope is to weaponize the antennae and scramble their guidance systems. Sweeping the ray over enemy craft will cause them to change their direction. By holding down the left mouse button, we can focus our ray fora more intense effect. Prolonged exposure to the ray will permanently fry their movement. You'll see their outlines turn green to indicate that the threat has been neutralized.
